full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL SRAS 'CHAD KHA PA YE SHES RDO RJE'I BLO SBYONG DON BDUN MA'I RTZA TSIG BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B ZHES PA SNYOMS LAS MKHAN (RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO ZHES BYA BA) ZHIG GIS, ,'DI YI 'GREL BA MANG PO LAS, ,LEGS PA'I CHA RNAMS BTUS TE BRIS, ,DGE BAS BDAG 'DZIN BRLAG PAR SHOG , ,,(^MGON PO ZHI BA LHA YI BSLAB PA KUN LAS BTUS PA LAS, 'PHAGS PA DPA' BAR 'GRO BA'I MDO LAS, GA-YO BYAS TE BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS BSKYED PAS KYANG SANGS RGYAS KYI RGYUR GSUNGS NA DGE BA SNA 'GA' BYAS TE SEMS BSKYED PA LTA CI SMOS ZHES SO, ,)
